alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Gosper and northwestern Furnas Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 26 miles southeast of Curtis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Gosper and northwestern Furnas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
